name: Auto-fix eligible - simple typo
description: Simple typo in error message should be auto-fixable

input.title: Typo in error message: 'Invlaid' instead of 'Invalid'
input.body:
In the error handling code, there's a typo in the error message.

Current: "Invlaid PDF format"
Expected: "Invalid PDF format"

This appears in the PdfProcessor.java file around line 150.
